thread.title: john voutour
thread.title_full: Zip Scanners reviewed by john voutour

author: john voutour
title: john voutour
text: I bought a uniden 436 BCD HD about 1.5 years ago .It took me a long time to understand the operation of the scanner.once I figured out how it operates. I enjoy listing to it .Niagara county ny where I live went digital with police & fire.now I can listen to them.I have had bear cat / uniden scanners for many years. I like uniden scanners cause their easy to operate
